line-7: ðŸŒŸ Join Our Team at Network Rail! ðŸŒŸAre you ready to make a difference in people's lives? At Network Rail, we connect passengers and freight customers, ensuring safe and efficient transportation across the country. We're an organisation where people truly matter, and when you join us, you matter to us and millions of others. Click here to watch our inspiring video to learn more about us!We're dedicated to building a diverse and inclusive organisation that reflects the passengers we serve. To achieve this, we're committed to becoming an open, diverse, and inclusive workplace, leveraging the skills and expertise of our talented workforce. Together, we strive to create a safe and accessible railway for everyone. Discover more about the importance of Diversity and Inclusion at Network Rail by clicking here. Investing in our people is key to enhancing the safety, reliability, and efficiency of our railway system. If you're passionate about making a meaningful impact, then this opportunity is for you! About our people and the recruitment process - We're an inclusive employer of choice and we welcome applications from everyone! We encourage our colleagues to work flexibly, as we know traditional working patterns don't always fit. If you want to consider working flexibly, just let us know and we'll do our best to help and invest in your career with us, whilst you have a healthy work life balance. We're also a Disability Confident Leader employer and we'll try our best to adapt the process and offer a reasonable alternative to help support people with disabilities access, apply and interview for roles.
line-9: We have a 12-month Secondment/ FTC opportunity for a Resourcing Business Partner to be part of Network Rail's Southern Region Resourcing Team. Youâ€™ll form part of our Southern Region Resourcing Team and be the dedicated RBP for our Sussex Route. Based at London Blackfriars, you will provide an exceptional candidate experience, as well as providing specialist resourcing advice and guidance to hiring managers. We are able to offer hybrid working, with the requirement to be in the office 2/3 days a week.
line-11: What to expect? As Resourcing Business Partner youâ€™ll be responsible for the day-to-day recruitment activities and play a key role in helping Sussex Route deliver a safe and reliable railway service through your role in attracting and recruiting a diverse range of talent. You'll be involved in activities such as: Â· Managing the recruitment life cycle from advert to candidate offer, ensuring candidates and hiring managers receive a great experience throughout the process. Â· Working on Diversity and Inclusion initiatives to further increase Diversity across the Sussex Route. Â· Providing specialist advice and guidance to hiring managers on attracting a diverse range of talent into Network Rail/Sussex Route. Â· Working with our managers and finance team to provide an accurate resource plan and forecast. Â· Managing and coordinating bespoke recruitment campaigns for a variety of management and frontline roles. Â· Sourcing talent through various recruitment channels and other resourcing methods (e.g. career fairs) such as assessment centres. Â· Keeping talent pools â€˜warmâ€™ through organising online recruitment events, and sending other collateral, such as newsletters. We are looking for someone who can demonstrate the following: Â· Demonstrates strong business/commercial approach and understanding of business needs. Â· Proven experience of working in partnership and building strong working relationships with senior managers in order to improve resourcing delivery. Â· Passionate about customer service with ability to articulate previous achievements through business deliverables. Â· Knowledge and experience of implementing best practice recruitment solutions to drive a value-added service. Â· Experience of influencing senior managers. Â· Excellent communication skills and ability to negotiate and influence effectively with all levels of an organisation. Â· Understands how to work with the business to identify, develop and implement appropriate resourcing solutions. Â· Proven track record of operating in a complex working environment. #LI-DB1
